page.title: 05Lifestyle-Risby village
page.content: RISBY. Despite its closeness to the town the village maintains a distinct community life of its own. Amenities include the village hall which is well used for a range of activities such as clubs (see Leisure), the Post Office and the Garden and Camping centre. The monthly village newsletter indicates the existence of many community functions many of which are encouraged by the new additions to the village, who are people whose work and life centres on the town but have chosen to live in the village because of its peaceful country setting and the desire to be part of a small community. Some indicated that they prefer their children to attend a village school which was close at hand.
